CustomField.formula: IF(AND((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) >= 60, (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) < 90), 60, IF(AND((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) >= 90, (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) < 120), 90, IF(AND((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) >= 120, (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) < 150), 120, IF(AND((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) >= 150, (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) < 180), 150, IF(AND((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) >= 180, (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) < 210), 180, IF(AND((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) >= 210, (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) < 240), 210, IF(AND((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) >= 240, (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) < 270), 240, IF(AND((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) >= 270, (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) < 300), 270, IF(AND((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) >= 300, (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) < 330), 300, IF(AND((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) >= 330, (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) < 360), 330, IF((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - Opportunity__r.Booking__r.RW_Key_handover_date__c) >= 360, 360, 0) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Post Possession Frequency Days
